pinkDressGirlMouse.speaker: Mouse Jennie
pinkDressGirlMouse.text: This is beneath me. That phone? Never seen it. And I certainly don't know anything about any white powder.

options.speaker: Detective
options.text: Granny says a lot of things.

options.speaker: Detective
options.text: You brought up the powder first...

pinkDressGirlMouse.speaker: Mouse Jennie
pinkDressGirlMouse.text: Aww, thank you! At least one cop here has manners.

pinkDressGirlMouse.speaker: Mouse Jennie
pinkDressGirlMouse.text: Hmph, youâ€™re just mean. I'm not talking to you.

pinkDressGirlMouse.speaker: Mouse Jennie
pinkDressGirlMouse.text: I... I was just guessing! Because of the raid! Go away!

pinkDressGirlMouse.speaker: Mouse Jennie
pinkDressGirlMouse.text: YOU FINISHED IT?! Do you know how much that cos-... uh, how dangerous that is?!

options.speaker: Detective
options.text: You seemed worried about the cost there.

pinkDressGirlMouse.speaker: Mouse Jennie
pinkDressGirlMouse.text: I don't know what you're talking about! Talk to my lawyer!

pinkDressGirlMouse.speaker: Mouse Jennie
pinkDressGirlMouse.text: Ugh, get away from me! You smell like chemicals and desperation.

pinkDressGirlMouse.speaker: Mouse Jennie
pinkDressGirlMouse.text: Ew, you're eating evidence? That's so unprofessional. And fattening.

pinkDressGirlMouse.speaker: Mouse Jennie
pinkDressGirlMouse.text: Stop waving that phone around. It doesn't match my outfit anyway.

options.speaker: Detective
options.text: Are you sure? It has messages about a 'drop off'.

pinkDressGirlMouse.speaker: Mouse Jennie
pinkDressGirlMouse.text: I said I've never seen it! Leave me alone!
